attributes.action: make it compulsory for vehicle adverts to display fuel consumption and emissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the price of oil rising rapidly and the climate change issue gaining more and more prominence, it is time to make vehicle manufacturers accountable for the impact of their products on consumers' wallets, lungs and environment.  Please make it compulsory that adverts include the information that allows people to make an ethical and economic decision, such as mileage and emissions.  This will encourage manufacturers to make cars more efficent and cut emissions.
